summary: Mount Kilimanjaro is the tallest mountain in Africa and the world's highest free-standing mountain, located in Tanzania. It has three peaks and stands at 19,341 feet above sea level. The mountain was once home to the Chagga Kingdoms and was first reported by a German missionary in 1848. It became a national park in 1973 and is a popular hiking and climbing spot. Kilimanjaro is over 2 million years old, has unique plant life, and is topped by large glaciers that are sadly shrinking quickly.
title: Mount Kilimanjaro
